name: World Wide Woman
content: Your girl can take it there
You know I'm the type of girl
Your girl can take it there
You know I'm the type of girl
Or overseas on them cobblestone roads
I could just provide all those
What you need and all the essentials
相信我我就是你要找的
Your girl can take it there
You know I'm the type of girl
If it's like a mack you want
如果这是你想要的 老弟
Baby if you connect with me
You won't know how to let go
你不会知道怎样摆脱我
一个你从未见过的地方
Like any world wide woman would need
就像全世界任何的女人都需要
I know you think that can't be
But you feel so damn real to me
但是你对我感觉那样真实
过来带头儿 和我一起加入这个世界
